AlgOS

Capturing CO 2 with the power of micro algae

Find out more

Hi, we are AlgOS

We develop an advanced microalgae-based carbon capture technology to make a significant positive impact on our environment and pave the way towards a carbon-negative future.

Additional

We grow fresh biomass in an environment that does not compete with other biomass like trees or crops.

Permanent

Through pyrolysis we produce biochar and (pyrolysis) oil which can be stored for 1.000+ years.

Verifiable

We monitor every step of the process digitally and provide a public track of each ton CO 2 via established platforms.

Why Microalgae?

Microalgae are highly efficient at capturing carbon dioxide and have a much faster growth rate than terrestrial plants. They can be grown in an isolated environment ensuring we do not compete for valuable resources like arable land nor interfere with existing eco systems.

Technology

We develop a carbon capturing technology that's sustainable, eco-friendly, and minimizes its impact on existing ecosystems. Our technology captures carbon that would otherwise remain in the atmosphere and stores it permanently. We're committed to creating a solution that's not only effective but also responsible, ensuring a better future for our planet.

Storage

The algae biomass in converted though pyrolisis into a stable carbon product like biochar or bio-oil. This avoids the natural decay of the biomass and the release of the carbon. It enables a long term sequestration of the carbon under in the ground.
